intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual_property.content_1: All copyrights, trademarks, trade names, trade dress, designs, website features, and any other forms of intellectual property and materials and other rights related to the website, including software, HTML code, and other codes used on the website or page titles, images, texts, illustrations, formats, logos, designs, icons, images, software, music clips, downloads, or videos (collectively, "Intellectual Property"), remain at all times the property and original right of us and/or their owners, and are protected by the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and international trademark and copyright laws.
intellectual_property.content_2: You may not provide or make available the Intellectual Property to any third party as a form of trade, and you will not acquire any copyright, trademark, or other property rights whatsoever with respect to the Intellectual Property, and no license, right, or interest in any materials or software shall accrue to you as a result of your use of this website or your access to, display, download, or print the Intellectual Property.
intellectual_property.content_3: There may be a slight difference in the design of the external form "package - carton" of the product received by the customer and its display image on the website due to the release of a newer design of the package or external carton of the product by the manufacturer, but this does not mean a difference in the product content. The website guarantees this to you and always seeks to update and renew product display images periodically.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: The Go Tawfeer website recognizes the importance of privacy and protection of your data, and therefore we are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of sensitive information and protecting the rights of all visitors to this website. We have prepared this policy specifically to clarify all of the following:
privacy_policy.intro_html: The Go Tawfeer website recognizes the importance of privacy and protection of your data, and therefore we are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of sensitive information and protecting the rights of all visitors to this website. We have prepared this policy specifically to clarify all of the following:

consent.title: Consent to Privacy Policy
consent.content: Your use of the Go Tawfeer website and its applications means your consent to this privacy policy, and the controls and terms that govern the platform and application. If you do not agree to this policy, you must not use any of the services provided through the Go Tawfeer platform and website.

who_collects.title: Who Collects User Data?
who_collects.content: As soon as you visit the Go Tawfeer platform website, the platform's server, which operates automatically, records your Internet Protocol (IP) address (your Internet Protocol address is the unique number of the computer you use, which allows other devices connected to the Internet to identify the destination of data sent from it, and collects some information such as browser type and search engine, date and time of visit, and the URL of any website from which you are referred to the Go Tawfeer website portal, but without identifying your personal identity).

external_links.title: Links to Other Websites and Third Parties on the Internet
external_links.content: This privacy approach applies only to the Go Tawfeer platform. If you move to another website, you must read that website's privacy approach to determine the information security practices and privacy policy adopted there.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: The website may store what are called "Cookies" on your computer when you visit the platform. Cookies are part of the data that uniquely identifies you as a user, and can also be used to develop knowledge of the platform and to better understand the user base of this platform. Most browsers are initially set to accept cookies, and you can reset your browser to reject all cookies or to alert when cookies are sent. Please also note that some services displayed on this platform may not work correctly if you reject cookies, as we may / may not link the information we store in cookies to any personally identifiable information you provide on our site.

personal_info.title: Personal Information
personal_info.content: The Go Tawfeer website collects information that is permitted and recognized for platform users, and the platform and its affiliated application do not store this information. The Go Tawfeer platform complies with and adheres to the main principles and general rules for personal data protection, as well as the main principles and general rules for data sharing.

location.title: Geographic Location
location.content: The user may sometimes be asked to consent to determining their geographic location, to benefit from some services provided on the Go Tawfeer platform.

purpose.title: What is the Purpose of Data Collection?
purpose.content: The platform's use of your Internet Protocol helps diagnose problems that occur in its servers, and also helps it conduct the necessary statistics to measure website usage (number of visitors and the language of the computer you use). The platform does not allow any party outside the framework of its technical team to view your Internet Protocol.

secure_transfer.title: Secure Information Transfer
secure_transfer.content: We guarantee that this website has the highest security measures to protect the information you provide to it. The website encrypts information that is considered sensitive (such as credit card numbers) or data that must be kept confidential in accordance with legal requirements.

protection.title: Personal Information Protection
protection.content: Your personal information will not be available except to platform employees who need to view it. That information will not be available to the public. Furthermore, none of that information will be exchanged, traded, or sold to any other party without the user's prior consent, and access to information will only be allowed to qualified persons who provide platform services.

user_rights.title: User Rights
user_rights.intro: Any user who provides the platform with their personal information has the right to:
user_rights.contact_note: This is done by sending an email to the email address specified on the platform

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions regarding our privacy policy, or need assistance or wish to file a complaint, please contact us via:

changes.title: Changes That May Occur to the Privacy Policy
changes.content: The Go Tawfeer platform has the freedom to update this privacy policy at any time. To know the last update made to it; the user must review the update date at the bottom of this page.

principles.title: More Information
principles.intro: The privacy policy on the Go Tawfeer website platform is subject to the main principles, as commonly recognized.
principles.subtitle: Main Principles for Personal Data Protection
principles.responsibility: First Principle: Responsibility — To identify and document privacy policies and procedures of the controlling entity and adopt them by the first responsible person in the entity (or his delegate), and publish them to all parties concerned with their implementation.
principles.transparency: Second Principle: Transparency — To prepare a notice about the privacy policies and procedures of the controlling entity that specifies the purposes for which personal data was processed in a specific, clear, and explicit manner.
principles.choice: Third Principle: Choice and Consent — To identify all possible options for the data owner and obtain their consent (implicit or explicit) regarding the collection, use, or disclosure of their data.
principles.limit_collection: Fourth Principle: Limit Data Collection — To limit the collection of personal data to the minimum amount of data that can achieve the purposes specified in the privacy notice.
principles.retention: Fifth Principle: Limit Use, Retention, and Disposal of Data — To restrict the processing of personal data to the purposes specified in the privacy notice for which the data owner provided their implicit or explicit consent, and to retain it as long as necessary to achieve the specified purposes or as required by the regulations, bylaws, and policies in force in the Kingdom, and to destroy it in a secure manner that prevents leakage, loss, theft, misuse, or unauthorized access.
principles.access: Sixth Principle: Access to Data — To identify and provide the means through which the data owner can access their personal data to review, update, and correct it.
principles.limit_disclosure: Seventh Principle: Limit Data Disclosure — To restrict the disclosure of personal data to external parties to the purposes specified in the privacy notice for which the data owner provided their implicit or explicit consent.
principles.security: Eighth Principle: Data Security — To protect personal data from leakage, damage, loss, theft, misuse, modification, or unauthorized access.
principles.quality: Ninth Principle: Data Quality — To maintain personal data in an accurate, complete, and directly related manner to the purposes specified in the privacy notice.
principles.monitoring: Tenth Principle: Monitoring and Compliance — To monitor compliance with the privacy policies and procedures of the controlling entity, and to handle inquiries, complaints, and disputes related to privacy.

sharing.title: Main Principles and General Rules for Data
sharing.content: Eligibility of data access by qualified and properly trained persons. All necessary information for data exchange is shared, including required data, the purpose of collection, means of transfer, storage methods, controls used to protect it, and disposal mechanisms. Security controls stipulated in the data sharing agreement are applied. Appropriate security controls are applied to protect data and share it in a secure and reliable environment in accordance with relevant regulations and legislation

shipping.title: Shipping Policy
shipping.intro_1: At our company, we recognize the importance of timely delivery. Our dedicated team works hard to process and ship your orders quickly, aiming to deliver them to your doorstep within the expected timeframe.
shipping.intro_2: We strive to provide fast and reliable shipping for our customers. Here's everything you need to know about our shipping process:
shipping.delivery_jeddah_makkah: Delivery time for Jeddah and Makkah: 3 business days.
shipping.delivery_kingdom: Delivery time for all parts of the Kingdom: 5 business days.
shipping.free_shipping: Free shipping on all products when purchasing a value of no less than 199 Saudi Riyals.
shipping.note: Please note that delivery times are estimates and may vary based on factors such as product availability, destination, and shipping company delays.

return.title: Return Policy
return.question: What is our return policy for electronics products?
return.contact: Customers can submit a return or refund request only by contacting the customer support team via WhatsApp.
return.refund_period: Products purchased can be refunded within 7 days if the following conditions are met:

conditions.clarification: If you need any clarification, please contact a customer service representative for assistance.
conditions.damaged: Products damaged due to misuse or showing signs of wear, even if still under warranty.
conditions.used: Products that have been used, modified, assembled, or installed, unless defective.

return.non_returnable_title: To ensure your safety, the following products cannot be returned or exchanged, including products that have been used or opened:

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Disclaimer: Some products sold are prohibited from use except in front of mahrams, as Allah Almighty said ( وَلَا يُبْدِينَ زِينَتَهُنَّ إِلَّا لِبُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ آبَائِهِنَّ أَوْ آبَاءِ بُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ أَبْنَائِهِنَّ أَوْ أَبْنَاءِ بُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ إِخْوَانِهِنَّ أَوْ بَنِي إِخْوَانِهِنَّ أَوْ بَنِي أَخَوَاتِهِنَّ ) Surat An-Nur, verse 31 (to the end of the verse)

terms_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_conditions.time_limit: Goods exchange will not be accepted after 7 days from the order date.
terms_conditions.packaging_difference: There may be a slight difference in the external design "package - carton" of the product received by the customer, and some may request to exchange it. This is due to the manufacturer releasing a newer design for the package or outer carton of the product, and it does not differ from the product content. (The website guarantees this and always strives to update and renew product display images periodically).
terms_conditions.refund_time: In case of accepting the return, the value of purchased products will be refunded via bank cards to the bank card account within a period of up to 7 business days.
terms_conditions.returnable_products: For your satisfaction, the following products will be returned:
terms_conditions.damaged_product: If you received a damaged product, or a product different from the order by mistake, please notify us through customer service to return the product in its original condition and within 7 days of receiving the order. Products must be well-matched, in good condition, and unused.
terms_conditions.cosmetics_return: You can also return cosmetic products, provided they have not been used or inspected, and they must be in their original condition as received from the seller, sealed.
terms_conditions.counterfeit_products: If the products are counterfeit, and the original packaging is poor and attached with the returned product.
terms_conditions.proof: Proof of purchase must be attached, such as order confirmation or receipt.
terms_conditions.processing: Once products are received and after verification and inspection, the refund request will be processed and submitted:
terms_conditions.verify: Please verify and check the products to be returned before shipping. We will not be responsible for returning any incorrect / missing products.
terms_conditions.return_fees: When requesting a return for any reason other than a manufacturing defect or damaged products, return fees will be deducted (which will be determined upon request).
terms_conditions.no_defect_note: Note: If a product is returned due to a customer easily claiming a defect, and upon inspection, we found that the product has no defect, shipping and return fees will not be refunded.
terms_conditions.shipping_fees: Please note that shipping and return fees for any order are non-refundable, except in the case where the reason for product return is damage / defect.
terms_conditions.faq_question: Q: Can I return a cosmetic product in its original condition?
terms_conditions.faq_answer: A: To ensure your safety, cosmetic products cannot be returned even if they are in their original condition.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content_1: Cancellation operations depend on whether your order has been shipped or not. If your order is still being processed, you can cancel the order simply through the customer service communication team via WhatsApp, and no cancellation request will be accepted after 24 hours from registering the order on the website.
cancellation.content_2: Note: If the order has been shipped, it will not be cancelled, and it will be considered a return. For more details, please refer to our product return policy.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Disclaimer: Some products sold are prohibited from use except in front of mahrams, as Allah Almighty said ( وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ قَالُواْ بَلْ نَتَّبِعُ مَآ أَلْفَيْنَا عَلَيْهِ ءَابَآءَنَآ ۚ أَوَلَوْ كَانَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَهْتَدُونَ ) Surat Al-Baqarah (170 to the end of the verse)

items.time_limit: Goods exchange will not be accepted after {days} days from the order date.
items.packaging_difference: The product color or some packaging details (package - carton) may differ from what is shown on the website due to updates from the manufacturer. This is not considered a product defect.
items.refund_time: In case of electronic payment, the value of returned products will be refunded to the card account used and may take up to {days} business days.
items.damaged_product: If you received a damaged product or a product different from the order, please notify the customer service team to return the product within {days} days of receiving the order. Products must be in good condition and unused.
items.devices: Devices can be returned provided they are not opened or used and are in their original condition with boxes, accessories, and original packaging.
items.proof: Proof of purchase (order confirmation or receipt) is required to complete the return process.
items.processing: Once products are received and inspected, the refund request will be processed.
items.verify: Verify products before shipping. We will not be responsible for incorrect or missing products.
items.no_defect: If a product is returned that does not have a manufacturing defect and after inspection it is found to be sound, shipping and return fees will not be refunded.
items.shipping_fees: Shipping and return fees are non-refundable unless the reason for return is a defect or fault in the product.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question: Q: Can I return cosmetic products in their original condition?
faq.answer: A: We guarantee the return of cosmetic products even if they are in their original condition.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content_1: Cancellation operations depend on whether your order has been shipped or not. If your order has not been processed, you can cancel the order for free by contacting customer service via WhatsApp, and no cancellation request will be accepted after {hours} hours from placing the order on the website.
cancellation.content_2: If the order has been shipped, we will not be able to cancel it and it will be treated as a return — see the return policy for more details.

bulk_orders.title: Special and Bulk Orders
bulk_orders.content: If you need bulk orders of our distinctive and unique products in the Saudi market, we are here to help you meet your needs efficiently and effectively. We can provide support and assistance in large order operations with the best prices, highest quality, and appropriate packaging. Do not hesitate to contact us to discuss your requirements and ensure that all your needs are met perfectly.
bulk_orders.whatsapp_button: Click here to contact us on WhatsApp

important_notes.title: Important Notes
important_notes.content: We recommend reviewing the terms before completing the purchase. The company reserves the right to modify the terms at any time with appropriate notification to customers.

about.description: We strive to provide a comprehensive and reliable shopping experience for middle-income families, by providing original and diverse products at competitive prices, while supporting local and international brands
about.vision_title: Best Value and Exceptional Shopping Experience
about.vision_content: To be the first e-marketplace for middle-income families and people who care about their personal hygiene and beauty, where we provide everything the family needs under one roof with the best value and exceptional shopping experience
about.mission_title: Providing a Safe and Easy E-commerce Environment
about.mission_content: We are committed to providing a safe and easy-to-use e-commerce environment that focuses on the needs of middle-income families, offers high value for money, while emphasizing quality, diversity, and exclusivity.
about.why_us_title: Our Commitment to Quality and Excellence

unique_experience.title: Unique Experience
unique_experience.content: We provide a comfortable and comprehensive shopping experience through our online store.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: Building and maintaining trust through transparency, authenticity, and commitment to delivering what is promised to customers.

competitive_prices.title: Competitive Prices
competitive_prices.content: Providing high quality at prices suitable for all categories.

product_variety.title: Product Variety
product_variety.content: A wide range of products that meet various personal care needs.

natural_products.question: Are the products natural and safe to use?
natural_products.answer: Yes, all our products are carefully made from natural ingredients to ensure their safety and effectiveness. We are committed to providing products that meet the highest quality standards.

shipping.question: Is shipping available to all areas?
shipping.answer: Yes, we provide shipping services to all areas within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia with guaranteed fast and secure delivery to your doorstep.

track_order.question: How can I track my order status?
track_order.answer: After completing your order, you will receive a confirmation message containing a tracking number that you can use to easily track your shipment status.

offers.question: Do you offer promotions and discounts?
offers.answer: Yes, we regularly offer special promotions and discounts on our products. Make sure to follow our store to get the best offers.
